column4: hey all of a sudden there are a couple of websites that i cant get to (shows the page not found thing) happens in firefox and opera but i've been on them before any ideas?
I still say my guess is broken dns
give me the url of one such page
ok.. works from here.. try running this in a terminal "host pepboys.com"
pepboys.com has address 168.220.64.64 you get the same ip?
if you write the ip instead of the url, does that work?
i've only found two pages that actually do this to me so far, the other one is netscape.com
it's kind of strange.. can you ping the ip-number of popboys.com? or just "ping pepboys.com" ?
oh i havent tried that... just got 100% packet loss
then something is blocking... you say these sites works sometimes?
no, they dont work at all now, but i go on pepboys all the time, its just the past couple of days i cant get on it
have you installed something lately? firewall software?
. KlrSpz: dns lookup returns the correct ip.. he just can't send any data to it..
you're welcome.. hope you figure it out
